description: Successfully completed a full development sprint for CAREV2, enhancing the user experience of an aging application through a technology stack upgrade using .NET Core and Angular. Collaborated closely with the Data Hub team to design and integrate RESTful APIs for efficient and secure data transfer. Involved in complete revamping of user interface of NSU application, including Angular upgrade, introducing dynamic rendering and reusable shared components for performance and size enhancement. Designed and delivered a proof of concept (POC) for the AML EWRA application within three months, including SQL database architecture and data modeling. Actively maintained multiple applications, create technical documentation, and developed comprehensive test cases to ensure functionality, stability, and quality assurance.

Designed, implemented, and upgraded an in-house material control tool according to buyers and planners requirements. Successfully transforming manual Excel-based workflows into a streamlined, automated system process. Transition of the annual Q2 and Q4 inventory count processes into a centralized platform that helps to reduce human errors, simplifying complex operation, and enhancing transparency and traceability of actions. Analysed and architected dynamic components to centralised and eliminate replicated process flow, shortened development timeline when meeting user requirement on similar setup.

Conducted practical classes on Web Systems and Technologies, guiding students through hands-on learning with PHP and MySQL for dynamic web development. Monitored and assessed academic progress, providing constructive feedback and academic support. Encouraged intellectual curiosity, critical thinking, and a sense of responsibility among students. Collaborated with students on developing complete web systems, offering real-world insights into effective database design, CRUD operations, and form control. Regularly shared practical industry examples to bridge the gap between theory and application.

DDeveloped e-commerce system using Node/ExpressJS framework. Deployed application under Heroku and architected SQL database design along with REST APIs that served for data transfer. Integrated Stripe as the payment gateway to securely manage user and vendor payment account details and process real-time transactions. Additionally, configured and deployed Twilio SendGrid to handle automated email workflows for user subscriptions, order confirmations, and account changes, enabling traceability of user actions and enhancing customer communication.

Led and delivered a 7-month Agile sprint to design and develop an in-house e-commerce system using Node.js and Express.js. Architected the SQL database schema and modeled RESTful APIs to support scalable and efficient data operations. Managed a team of three engineers, overseeing development progress and ensuring timely delivery of sprint milestones. Initiated, planned, and executed a Raspberry Piâ€“based hardware project that successfully replaced legacy IRV machines with a more compact, efficient solution. Upgraded various in-house software systems based on user feedback and evolving requirements, and proactively established documentation practices across all internal projects to support onboarding and long-term maintainability.
